GSD.product_version: versions from v5.9 to before v5.10.89
GSD.description:
platform/x86: intel_pmc_core: fix memleak on registration failure

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.89 by commit 7a37f2e370699e2feca3dca6c8178c71ceee7e8a, it was introduced in version v5.9 by commit 938835aa903ae19ad62805134f79bbcf20fc3bea. For more details please see the references link.
